timeline.message: allow check for exist w/o creating
dont' create blockmanaagaer, shutdownmanager if not present

timeline.bodyText: Should this method and the method preceding it (containsDefault) not be the same method?
timeline.author: rhwood

replies.bodyText:
Probably.  I think I managed to confuse myself with the multiple meanings of "default" here.
containsDefault creates a List<T> and fires a property event, but the list is empty so there's no default item.
replies.author: bobjacobsen
